Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory51.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When Noan turns to the last page, it is already late in the night.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Commandant? We need to go.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He calls softly, but the human is still deep asleep.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Commandant... You can't stay here too long. You should rest in your own lounge, or Gray Raven's preparation room.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He tries to wake the commandant up again, but nothing happens.'}
{3: 'Noan sighs with a smile. He gently puts the human on his back.'}
{3: "He is about to go back to Gray Raven's preparation room, but the terminal suddenly rings. The vibration causes it to slip out of the human's hand."}
{3: 'Noan can guess who is calling without answering the call. The commandant called a sick leave but is still not back. There must be a lot of people worrying.'}
{3: "Even so, he still wishes nobody interrupts the commandant's rare, good sleep."}
{3: 'He had problems sleeping before, so he knows how precious this moment is.'}
{3: 'He carefully picks up the terminal and turns off the ringing while keeping his balance.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "...Where's the lounge?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Um, I don't know where Gray Raven Commandant's lounge is... Forget it...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Noan helps the human to get steady. He gently walks toward Gray Raven's preparation room."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory419.jpg'}
{3: 'He avoids the surveillance in the safety path and returns to the square.'}
{3: 'The person on his back is breathing calmly.'}
{3: "Compared with him, the human's body is soft and warm, trembling as he walks forward. A few hairs are scratching against his ear."}
{3: 'He checks again, but the human has no signs of waking up.'}
{3: 'Have you been too exhausted lately?'}
{3: "Are you sleeping so deep because you haven't relaxed for a long time?"}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Are you really not scared of me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ever since he started to use the "Noan" name again, many troubles have come back to him, making his awkward situation in Babylonia even worse.'}
{3: 'Which makes him fall back to the same state he had a few years ago.'}
{3: 'Noan knows it is not good, but whenever he is questioned or avoided by others, he would smile and try to change the topic out of instinct.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's been many years since I left the cargo team...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Life in Asslam was harsh, but he could rely on others without being on guard. This peace of mind had always been his best way to relax.'}
{3: 'Like a wanderer in the night finally seeing a familiar light, he feels a nostalgic, calming emotion.'}
{3: 'If only he can stay a little longer in this relaxed moment. If only he can keep one person that is willing to trust him in this strange and lonely environment.'}
{3: 'He wants to stay with true friends and find his honesty, sincerity, and kindness back.'}
{3: 'Lillian once asked him when he just arrived in Babylonia...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: 'What are Babylonia and Dark Aries to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'A prison? Or a temporary shelter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'To me, this is more like a training room for self-redemption. It is a journey to prove myself.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory419.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Not just about the Ascendants, but also everything behind the name "Noan"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I want to take this opportunity to stop running and hiding. I want to embrace the future with my original name and look.', 4: '1'}
{3: "—Because that's the kind of life he likes."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: "Noan knocks on the door of Gray Raven's preparation room, but nobody answers. He carefully walks in."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'Where is Lee...? Nobody is here...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He was prepared to receive a reprimand. Now he finally lets out a sigh of relief.'}
{3: 'He gets down on one knee and puts down the person behind with extremely slow and gentle action.'}
{3: "He then finds the commandant's coat and covers the human with it."}
{3: 'The time displayed on the terminal has gone past 12:00 a.m.'}
{3: 'Time is running out. He must return to the library and put on his "shackle."'}
{3: 'He would like to stay a little longer in this calm moment.'}
{3: "Noan spreads out the coat and gently moves the human's hairs near the eyelashes behind ears."}
{3: 'He quietly gets up and leaves.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{3: 'When he returns to the deceitful night in the library, everything still looks the same.'}
{3: 'He hears someone shouting on the other side of the square. Another team of Constructs is rushing to battle.'}
{3: '—"We need a few more. It\'s an emergency!"'}
{3: '—"Leave that alone! They need our help!"'}
{3: 'They are igniting themselves in the battle.'}
{3: 'But the library is so quiet, as if it has never been visited by anyone.'}
{3: 'Only the wrist band is witnessing the impulsive trip he had earlier.'}
{3: 'If he just leaves this shackle here and blends in with those going to the battlefield, will he gain the freedom that he has always wanted?'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'But freedom always comes at a price.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan takes the tagged wrist band and puts it on himself again.'}
{3: 'He gazes at the crowd as they run, knowing that someone who is willing to trust him is having a deep sleep.'}
{3: 'For that trust, he will endure until he proves himself.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Good night, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He smiles like a spark in the night.'}
